qna.a:
To get set up and ready to make payments on WU® EDGE, first save all your supplier details – within WU® EDGE these are known as your beneficiaries. 
               When you receive your invoices, enter them into the system.
               You’ ll soon get a clear picture of your cash flow.As you progress with WU® EDGE, you’ ll want to take advantage of the more advanced features that give you real insight and control over your global transactions.

q: Which internet browser works best with WU® EDGE?
qna.a:
WU® EDGE works best with Google Chrome, although it can also be used with Internet Explorer 9, 10 and 11 and Apple Safari from version 10 on the Mac operating system. The most recent versions of Microsoft Edge and Mozilla Firefox also supported.  
              Whichever browser you use, be sure to keep it up to date.This will keep it running at its best and keep your data more secure.

q: How can I contact Western Union Business Solutions?
qna.a: For most queries, contact us below and we will respond within 1 working day. If you have an urgent query, please contact your account representative.

q: How do I enter an invoice from a supplier into WU® EDGE?
qna.a:
From the Homepage, select ‘Add invoice’.
              Choose the‘ Invoice’ option at the top of the Make a Payment page.
              Fill in the fields with the information from your invoice.
              You can choose to save the invoice by selecting 'Save for later'
              Pay the invoice straight away by selecting‘ Proceed to pay’
              If you intend to pay more than one invoice in a single transaction select‘ Add to order’.

q: Can I import Q and A Bot content from a file
qna.a: Yes, the Content Designer has an import function which lets you load items from a formatted JSON file. You can create JSON files using the Export feature, or you can write your own tools to create JSON files from existing content such as a website FAQ page.

q: How can I find specific Q and A items in the Designer UI
qna.a: Use the Filter feature in the Questions tab to filter the items list based on the ID field. Or use the Test tab to list all the items that match a question.

q: How do I modify Q and A Bot content
qna.a: Use the Content Designer Question and Test tools to find your existing documents and edit them directly in the console. You can also export existing documents as a JSON file, make changes to the file, and re-import.

q: How do I troubleshoot and fix problems with Q and A Bot.
qna.a: Use the Content Designer test tool to test a question, and check what items are returned, ranked in order of score. If the desired item does not have the highest score, then add the question to the item and run the test again. The desired item should now have the highest score. Take care not to create items with duplicate questions, to avoid unpredictable responses.
